title: FITspirational speaker series: 'Be Fearless, Be Full'
desc:
Join Macy?s healthy living ERG? FITfluence?as we bring in?Gina Keatley.?Culinary author, award-winning dietitian, media personality, television host, and founder/CEO of Nourishing USA. Join us as Gina details?her motto ?Be Fearless, Be Full?, by highlighting nutrient diversity and wellness. 
 Gina has most recently been announced the official spokesperson for, The Malaysia Kitchen for the world, an organization which aims to brand Malaysia as a multicultural, dynamic, and vibrant country through the varieties of it cuisine. Gina will help educate and inform consumers about Malaysian cuisine through her Christmas Ala Malaysia project that launched this October in NYC.? She will host a series of national media events which will allow guests to experience a flavorful journey into the diverse, wonderfully aromatic flavors of Malaysian cuisine. Come join us as Gina shares with FITfluence a small taste of her Christmas Ala Malaysia project just in time for the holidays.
